title: Why do people believe things that aren't true?
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: In the face of our "post-truth" era of politics, it's hard to know what to believe. According to psychology research, whether we know it or not, most of us harbor false beliefs. Do you?
itunes:subtitle: In the face of our "post-truth" era of politics, â€¦
